name: HOST PARTY
description:
Tonight Mommy isn't at home! She told Boxie to be a good boy at home...

SO BOXIE HOST A PARTY

Hello guys! This game is made within 48hrs for Game Jam From Home "Your Old School House Party" !

Boxie need to solve problems in his house party so Mommy won't know that Boxie host a party at home.

Hope you enjoy this video game! if you have any suggestion, please feel free to comment below.

HOW TO PLAY

Solve problems by using the right item to the right problems. 

  • W A S D > Movement
  • Space bar/E > Interact/Eat/Hold items
  • Q > Drop Item
  • I J K L > Action

Credits: Yutthana C. - Game Director, Programmer, 3D Artist, 3D Animator
Nij T. - Game Design, UX/UI Design, 2D Artist, 2D Animator
Wirachat K. - 3D Artist, Sound design
Saranyu K. - 3D Artist
Pattanit S. - 2D Artist
